Bash(# 依存関係チェック用の関数
check_page_dependencies() {
  local page_path=$1
  echo "Checking: $page_path"
  
  if [ -f "$page_path" ]; then
    # hooksのimportを確認
    echo "  Hooks used:"
    grep "from '@/_hooks" "$page_path" | sed 's/.*from/    -/' || echo "    - None found"
    
    # componentsのimportを確認
    echo "  Components used:"
    grep "from '@/_components" "$page_path" | sed 's/.*from/    -/' || echo "    - None found"
    
    # APIコールを確認
    echo "  API calls:"
    grep -E "(fetchGet|fetchPost|fetchPut|fetchDelete)" "$page_path" | sed 's/^/    - /' | head -5 || echo "    - None found"
  else
    echo "  ❌ Page not found"
  fi
  echo ""
}

echo -e "\n=== Dependency Check ==="
# 主要ページの依存関係をチェック
check_page_dependencies "ai-chat-ui/app/(org)/admin/[orgId]/dashboard/page.tsx"
check_page_dependencies "ai-chat-ui/app/(org)/admin/[orgId]/users/page.tsx"
check_page_dependencies "ai-chat-ui/app/(org)/admin/[orgId]/reports/page.tsx")
